remarks: Lemma for ~ lebnum .  By the previous lemmas, ` F ` is continuous and positive on a compact set, so it has a positive minimum ` r ` .  Then setting ` d = r / # ( U ) ` , since for each ` u e. U d = r ` , in contradiction to the assumption that ` r ` is the minimum of ` F ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)
